memberdef.name: gammaRb

detaileddescription.para:
The class fullvert defines a vertex in a full channel decomposition, i.e., it includes an irreducible (bare) contribution and a, p and t channel reducible contributions. In the standard configuration (only_same_channel=false and Ir=false), the fullvert is the full vertex Γ with all components. For Ir=true, it is an r-irreducible vertex I_r; for only_same_channel=true, it only contains the r-reducible component.
Q
Type of the data.
